column2: an A.M. Eatery////Not vegan friendly. I tried this place because I read they had vegan options but my order of The Snooze Classic with tofu instead of eggs was a failure. The tofu was straight out of the package
column3: they only managed to crumble it and it had no seasoning or anything added. The soyrizo was good but that's nothing they have to prepare
column4: and the pancakes are tasty but far from vegan. The staff was extremely slow to clear tables and the hour wait although expected for Sunday brunch
column5: could have been significantly reduced if the staff was more motivated to pick up the pace.
